metadata.key_specifications: 16-Kb Serial EEPROM memory device, configurable as 16-bit or 8-bit registers, self-timed internal write with auto-clear, Power-On Reset circuit, 1,000,000 program/erase cycles endurance, 100 years data retention, operating temperature range from -40°C to +125°C
metadata.applications: The datasheet does not explicitly mention main applications, but based on it being a serial EEPROM memory device, potential applications could include data storage and configuration settings in embedded systems, industrial control, consumer electronics, and other applications requiring non-volatile memory.

page_summaries.content: The CAT93C86B is a 16 −Kb Serial EEPROM memory device which is configured as either registers of 16 bits (ORG pin at VCC) or 8 bits (ORG pin at GND). Each register can be written (or read) serially by using the DI (or DO) pin. The CAT93C86B features a self −timed internal write with auto −clear. On −chip Power −On Reset circuit protects the internal logic against powering up in the wrong state.

Product Summary.content: The CAT93C86B is a 16-Kb Serial EEPROM memory device which is configured as either registers of 16 bits (ORG pin at VCC) or 8 bits (ORG pin at GND).
Each register can be written (or read) serially by using the DI (or DO) pin. The CAT93C86B features a self-timed internal write with auto-clear.
The CAT93C86B is a 16-Kb Serial EEPROM memory device with on-chip Power-On Reset circuit to protect the internal logic against powering up in the wrong state.
The CAT93C86B is a configurable 16-Kb Serial EEPROM memory device with serial read/write capabilities, self-timed internal write, and Power-On Reset protection.

Electrical Characteristics.content: Table 2 provides reliability characteristics such as endurance (minimum 1,000,000 program/erase cycles) and data retention (minimum 100 years). This information is crucial for understanding the longevity and durability of the electronic component.

Table 3 lists the D.C. operating characteristics, which include voltage and temperature ranges for operation. Specifically, it covers VCC ranges of +1.8 V to +5.5 V and temperature ranges of -40°C to +125°C, as well as a lower temperature range of -20°C to +85°C with a VCC range of +1.65 V to +5.5 V. These specifications are essential for ensuring proper operation within the specified electrical and environmental conditions.

Table 7 outlines the A.C. characteristics, which are likely related to timing specifications and other dynamic electrical parameters. Similar to Table 3, it covers the same voltage and temperature ranges, indicating that these specifications are applicable to both D.C. and A.C. operating conditions.

Table 8 provides the instruction set for the electronic component, which includes various commands such as READ, ERASE, WRITE, EWEN (Write Enable), EWDS (Write Disable), ERAL (Clear All Addresses), and WRAL (Write All Addresses). Each instruction is accompanied by its opcode, address format, and data format (where applicable). This information is crucial for understanding how to interact with and program the component.

SYMBOL MIN NOM MAX θ 0º 8º A 0.10 0.25 A1 0.33 0.51 b 0.19 0.25 0.25 c 0.25 0.50 D 4.80 5.00 5.80 E 5.80 6.20 E1 3.80 4.00 e 1.27 BSC h 1.75 L 0.40 1.27 1.35

UDFN8, 2x3 EXTENDED PAD is a package with dimensions and tolerancing per ASME Y14.5M, 1994 standard. The controlling dimension is in millimeters. The dimension 'b' applies to the plated terminal and is measured between 0.15 and 0.25mm from the terminal tip. Coplanarity applies to the exposed pad as well as the terminals.

SOIC-8, 150 mils package complies with JEDEC MS-012 standard. The dimensions are provided in millimeters and angles in degrees. The package has specific minimum, nominal, and maximum values for various symbols representing dimensions such as θ (angle), A, A1, b, c, D, E, E1, e, h, and L.

Reliability and Environmental Conditions.content: Table 2 presents reliability characteristics for the electronic component, including endurance (NEND) of 1,000,000 program/erase cycles and data retention (TDR) of 100 years. These specifications indicate the component's durability and longevity under normal operating conditions.

Table 3 outlines the D.C. operating characteristics for the electronic component, covering a supply voltage range (VCC) of +1.8 V to +5.5 V and temperature ranges (TA) of -40°C to +125°C or -20°C to +85°C, depending on the specific voltage range. These operating conditions define the environmental and electrical parameters within which the component is designed to function reliably.

The reliability characteristics, including endurance and data retention, along with the specified operating conditions for voltage and temperature ranges, provide crucial information about the electronic component's performance, durability, and environmental tolerances. These specifications are essential for ensuring proper operation and longevity in various applications and environments.

Endurance and data retention specifications indicate the component's ability to withstand repeated programming and erasure cycles and retain data over an extended period, respectively. The operating voltage and temperature ranges define the environmental conditions under which the component can operate reliably, enabling system designers to ensure compatibility and proper functionality in their target applications.

Packaging Information.content: The text provides ordering information for the CAT93C86B electronic component, including specific device markings, package types (SOIC-8, TSSOP-8, UDFN-8), temperature ranges (industrial or extended), and shipping details (tape & reel with quantity per reel).

It includes detailed dimensional drawings and specifications for the UDFN-8 (Case 517AZ), SOIC-8 (Case 751BD), and TSSOP-8 (Case 948AL) package types used for this component. The drawings show dimensions, tolerances, and other package details.

The text also mentions the marking convention used on the components, where XXX represents the specific device code, Y is the year, WW is the work week, A is the assembly location, and /C0071 indicates a Pb-free package.
